subject: Hockey, Ice
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Detroit Red Wings have traded forward Ville Leino to Philadelphia for defenseman Ole-Kristian Tollefsen and the Flyers’ fifth-round pick in the 2011 draft.
snippet: The Detroit Red Wings have traded forward Ville Leino to Philadelphia for defenseman Ole-Kristian Tollefsen and the Flyers’ fifth-round pick in the 2011 draft.
